feat(pi-de): Add send-during-streaming patch

- Create patchSendDuringStreaming.ts that patches AgentInterface.sendMessage to remove isStreaming gate
- Override MessageEditor.isStreaming property to always return false
- Users can now send follow-up messages while agent streams
- Add comprehensive tests with 16 test cases
- Update App.tsx to call both patchMobileKeyboard and patchSendDuringStreaming in useEffect
- All tests pass, build succeeds

feat(protocol,pi-socket): Add AbortRequest type and abort handler

- Add AbortRequest interface to hyper-pi-protocol for client abort messages
- Implement abort handler in pi-socket that calls ctx.abort() and returns
- Re-export AbortRequest from pi-socket/src/types.ts
- Add logging: info level

Implemented abort wire protocol: Added AbortRequest type to hyper-pi-protocol, implemented abort handler in pi-socket that calls ctx.abort() when receiving { type: 'abort' } messages, added 2 tests verifying abort behavior. All 96 pi-socket tests pass, protocol build succeeds.

- Add abort() tests: sends message when connected, no-op when disconnected, safe on CLOSED

feat(protocol): add ListCommandsRequest and CommandsListResponse types

Add protocol types for / command autocomplete:
- ListCommandsRequest: client request to list available / commands
- CommandsListResponse: server response with available commands
- CommandInfo: command metadata (name, description)

Update SocketEvent union to include CommandsListResponse.

feat(pi-de): autocomplete UI for / commands and @ file references

- Created Autocomplete.tsx component that patches message editor textarea
- Monitors for / at start of line (requests commands) and @ anywhere (requests files)
- Floating popup with up/down arrow navigation, Enter/Tab to select, Escape to dismiss
- Mouse click/hover support for item selection
- Max 10 filtered results with scroll support
- Added listCommands/listFiles methods to RemoteAgent
- Added onCommandsList/onFilesList callbacks for response handling
- Updated types.ts with CommandInfo, FileInfo, and protocol types
- Wired Autocomplete component into App.tsx
- Added comprehensive tests for RemoteAgent methods and Autocomplete interactions
- All 200 tests passing
